pr_title: Adds Import-/Export-Jobs concerning Archives (Only ZIP for now)

timeline.message:
Adds Import-/Export-Jobs concerning Archives (Only ZIP for now)

- Fixes: OX-5983

Changes execute method in super class to allow modifying the handling of a regular or archive file.

- Fixes: OX-5983

timeline.bodyText: Is it really prohibited to invoke close in that stream?
timeline.author: andyHa

replies.bodyText: Yes, because the output stream is for the whole archive. #putNextEntry does not create a new output stream but only creates a new entry inside the archive that is being written to when writing to the stream.
replies.author: fhaScireum

timeline.bodyText: Why not search the stream on demand here - should greatly simplify the code and male getFile re usable for the same file
timeline.author: andyHa

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn‘t we rather throw/abort here - we acutally expect an archive with multiple files answay
timeline.author: andyHa

replies.bodyText: This might generate quite a few changes in the job structure further down, but will simplify the logic here. I'll change it and see how much refactoring is actually needed.
replies.author: fhaScireum

timeline.message:
Directly open input streams when a file is requested. This allows for multiple reading of the same entry.

Also unifies naming scheme.

- Fixes: OX-5983

timeline.author: andyHa
qw3ry
qw3ry

timeline.message:
Adds missing javadoc and implements other requested changes from code reviews.

- Fixes: OX-5983
